CustomField.formula: CASE(Category_1__c, "Manager",((( Subtotal_for_Part3__c /40 ) *100) *(35/100)), "CEO",((( Subtotal_for_Part3__c /40 ) *100) *(35/100)), "GM",((( Subtotal_for_Part3__c /40 ) *100) *(35/100)), "HOD",((( Subtotal_for_Part3__c /40 ) *100) *(35/100)), "Asst Manager",((( Subtotal_for_Part3__c /40 ) *100) *(35/100)), ((( Subtotal_for_Part3__c /40 ) *100) *(30/100)) )
